page.title:
EDCCD: Baseline Sensor
EDCCD: Baseline Sensor

picture.caption: ▪ Event-Driven CCD: Advantages – Pixels are non-destructively sensed, and only those with signal charge are saved and digitized – Compatible with high yield BI processes
picture.name: Image15

picture.caption: ▪ System Constraints relief for Con-X – Lower power dissipation at a given frame rate (>100 x less) – Enables integrated flight camera testing at room temperature
picture.name: Image72
